data.title: Parties and Derby Tours
data.meta_description: Celebrate the Kentucky Derby weekend with class, elegance, & taste with parties. Choose a guided tour to elevate your weekend in Louisville, Kentucky.
data.text:
Elevate Your Derby Adventure

Discover Exciting Parties & Tours With Derby Experiences

Discover exclusive parties and behind-the-scenes tours at the Kentucky Derby with Derby Experiences. Join fellow enthusiasts for premium beverages, gourmet cuisine, and insider access to the heart of Derby excitement.

View Tour & Party Packages

Kentucky Derby® Parties

With an Official Ticket Package from Derby Experiences, you have the option of attending the most sought-after parties during the week and weekend of the Kentucky Derby. With celebrity appearances, live entertainment, gourmet food, and more, you won't want to miss these exclusive parties.

Taste of Derby

Give your palate the party it deserves with the Taste of Derby™ Party at the Kentucky International Convention Center! A night full of delicious cuisine, drink pairings, and Derby style.

Fillies & Lilies

Join Derby Experiences at Fillies & Lilies, an unforgettable night under the Twin Spires with live entertainment, premium food and beverage, and much more, all designed to dazzle your senses.

Derby Experiences Welcome Party

Spend an evening in the Kentucky Derby Museum while enjoying a delectable dinner with curated wine and bourbon flights.

Barnstable Brown Gala

Internationally recognized as one of the "Ten Best Parties in the World," the Barnstable Brown Gala is a star-studded event held at Patricia Barnstable-Brown's hilltop Louisville mansion.

Unbridled Eve Derby Gala

Kick off Derby weekend at the Galt House Hotel while enjoying a gourmet dinner and mingling with an array of celebrity guests. This event benefits numerous charitable causes through the Unbridled Charitable foundation.

Winner's Party

Toast to the victorious Derby owners, trainers, and jockey at the fashionable Winner's Party following the Kentucky Derby race!
